name: Chainlink Request Interface
description: This specification defines standard functions for the contract that uses the chainlink request interface.

functionDecorators.signature: oracleRequest(address, uint256, bytes32, address, bytes4, uint256, uint256, bytes)
functionDecorators.name: Oracle request

parameterDecorators.name: Request price
parameterDecorators.description: The amount of LINK to send with the request.

parameterDecorators.name: Service agreement ID
parameterDecorators.description: The ID of the service agreement to use.

parameterDecorators.name: Callback function ID
parameterDecorators.description: The callback function ID for the response

parameterDecorators.name: Nonce
parameterDecorators.description: The nonce sent by the requester.

parameterDecorators.name: Data version
parameterDecorators.description: The version of the data format for the request.

parameterDecorators.name: Payment
parameterDecorators.description: The amount of payment given (specified in wei).

parameterDecorators.name: Callback function ID
parameterDecorators.description: The requester's specified callback function selector.

parameterDecorators.name: Expiration
parameterDecorators.description: The time of the expiration for the request.
